info.name: Ecommerce API - Collection
info.description: Complete API collection for Ecommerce Backend with User Management, Product Management, Categories, Attributes, Variants, and Options. Updated for singular table names.

item.name: Authentication

request.description: Register a new user account. Creates entry in singular `user` table.
Login with email and password. Returns JWT token.

item.description: Authentication endpoints for user registration, login, and token management.

request.description: Get current user's profile from `user` table.

item.name: Address Management

request.description: Get all addresses for current user from `address` table (singular).
Add new address. Uses `street` and `zipCode` fields (not address_line1/postal_code).

item.description: Address management endpoints. Note: Uses singular `address` table with `street` and `zipCode` fields.

item.name: Categories

request.description: Get all categories from singular `category` table. Supports hierarchical structure.
Get child categories by parent ID.
Get all attributes for a category including inherited from parent categories.
Create new category. Requires seller authentication.

item.description: Category management endpoints. Uses singular `category` table with `isGlobal` and `sellerId` fields for multi-tenancy.

item.name: Attributes

request.description: Get all attribute definitions from `attribute_definition` table.
Get single attribute definition by ID.
Create new attribute definition. Note: uses `key` field for unique identifier.
Link attribute to category. Creates entry in `category_attribute` table with `attributeDefinitionId`.

item.description: Attribute definition management. Uses singular `attribute_definition` table with `key`, `name`, `unit`, and `allowedValues` fields.

item.name: Products

request.description: Get all products from singular `product` table with pagination.
Get product details with variants and attributes.
Get available filters for products in a category.
Get related products based on category and attributes.
Create new product. Requires seller authentication.

item.description: Product management endpoints. Uses singular `product` table with simplified structure (no extra fields like status, isActive, etc.).

item.name: Product Options

request.description: Get all available options for a product (Color, Size, Storage, etc.) from `product_option` table.

item.description: Product options management (for variant selection like Color, Size, Storage). Uses singular `product_option` table.

item.name: Product Variants

request.description: Find specific variant by option values. Links through `variant_option_value` table.
Get variant details by ID from `product_variant` table.
Create new product variant. Requires seller authentication.
Bulk update multiple variants at once.
Update only stock quantity for a variant.

item.description: Product variant management. Uses singular `product_variant` table with `variant_option_value` junction table for linking options.

item.name: Product Attributes

request.description: Get all attributes for a product.
Add a new attribute to a product.

item.description: Product attribute management endpoints for managing product-specific attributes.
